#### [Unemployment Shiny App](https://dettman.shinyapps.io/UnemploymentApp/)

 - This app uses `tidyquant` to fetch the most recent state-level UNRATE data from FRED. The app subtracts the oldest UNRATE from the newer rate to populate the interactive choropleth map made with `plotly`.

<br/>




<br/>

*Data last refreshed on `r Sys.Date()`.*

*Document Built with R Version: `r getRversion()`*
